faults.title: Cam Motor Overload
faults.message: The Cam Motor breaker has tripped due to an overload. Check that the cam mechanism is not blocked and can turn freely. This fault may indicate that an internal component is worn out. Check the bridge lever and centre die pin.

faults.title: Tension Motor Overload
faults.message: The Tension Motor breaker has tripped due to an overload. Check that the tension motor and mechanism is not blocked and free from debris. This fault may indicate that an internal component is worn out.

faults.title: Transport Motor Overload
faults.message: The Transport Motor breaker has tripped due to an overload. Check that the transport motor and mechanism is not blocked and free from debris. This fault may indicate that an internal component is worn out.

faults.title: Motor Supply Overload
faults.message: The breaker protecting all motors has tripped. Check the power supply and wiring

faults.title: Inverter Overload
faults.message: The breaker feeding the inverter has overloaded. Check transport motor

faults.title: Heater Circuit Overload
faults.message: The breaker on the heater circuit has tripped. Check the heater blade is functioning correctly

faults.title: Refeed Fault
faults.message: The strap was not able to be fed around the arch successfully. Ensure there are no blockages in the arch. Check that the strapping head and arch are aligned properly. Check that the B1 switch is operating correctly

faults.title: Safety Circuit Triggered
faults.message: The safety circuit has been triggered. Check safety fences and enclosures. Check safety circuit wiring

faults.title: Heater not at Temperature
faults.message: The safety circuit has been triggered. Check safety fences and enclosures. Check safety circuit wiring

faults.title: Cam Runtime
faults.message: The cam was unable to rotate to the next position before timing out. Check that the cam motor is connected correctly. Check that the cam motor brake is operating correctly. Check that the cam position proximity sensors are operating correctly

faults.title: Strap Retraction Timeout
faults.message: The strap was unable to be fully retracted before timing out. Check that the tension rocker sensor (B2) is operating correctly and has not come loose.

faults.title: Tensioning Timeout
faults.message: The strap was unable to be fully tensioned before timing out. Check that the tension rocker sensor (B2) is operating correctly and has not come loose. Check the tensioning time parameter is not too high

faults.title: Tension Relief Timeout
faults.message: The tension relief step has timed out. Check the connection to the tension motor contactors. Check that the tension relief time is not too high. Check the tension relief runtime parameter is not too short.
